alert.note: Alert for Dale; Henry (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 02 at 3:24PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Dale and southwestern Henry Counties through 400 PM CDT... At 324 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Headland, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Abbeville, Headland, Newville, Haleburg, Bells Crossroads, Tumbleton, Echo, Capps, Grandberry Crossroads, Snells Crossroads, Murphy Station, Headland Municipal A/P, Dancey, Ward Bridge, Bertha and Balkum. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
